results.definition: the management of someone or something
examples: the right to equal treatment in the criminal justice system

results.definition: an extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic
examples: his treatment of the race question is badly biased

results.definition: care provided to improve a situation (especially medical procedures or applications that are intended to relieve illness or injury)
a manner of dealing with something artistically
examples: his treatment of space borrows from Italian architecture
